"You want the truth, (you can't handle the just kidding) OK, I fealt 
cooped up in here so I did some adventuring and raninto a problem 
with a little kitty, I'm alive, it's dead, problem solved, I win." 
HThe wolfbot hoped that would be enough for Shadow wings curiosity.

"And while I'm telling the truth, I'm glad you were the one who came 
out to meet me, thank you." He was sincere about his words, now he 
hoped she'd be happy with his honesty.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Shadow Wing::
> 
> "Oh I don't know, maybe the truth would be nice?" 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The CR chamber opened to let Lunarpine out, his internal repairs 
> > could handle the rest. the only thing that it couldn't repair was 
> his 
> > pride.

> answer,

> > >

her

protect

finish

to
